title: Support Main Looking For ADC/ Team
body:
Hello,

Looking for a good ADC (silver+ would be ideal) to duo with and or team needing a Support.

Champs I can play:
{{champion:53}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:117}} 


Online everyday from: 8/8:30PM - 12AM NZT

Add me in game: Oriphix  or GhostPepper

Thanks

twitch.tv/oriphix

replies.body:
add me ign : eatyorice2 
current rank : unranked (was gold 1) 
main adc
online 12 hours a day
Hey man added you last night, keen for some games tonight if you are on. Cheers

Hi dude, 

I main adc and am keen to have some games :)
Silver 3 nz based add me JellyTots

Hey mate, would be keen to play some games :) I see you like {{champion:18}} 
Could jam some games tonight between 8:30-9:30
Sweet Il add you when I'm home! Nz or Aussie time?
Hey mate, would be down for some games. Just hit me up when you see me online. :)
